contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.qandaqu.QAndAQuestionPageContent:
We're trying to integrate our site with a service hosted by our client, and they've asked for an IP to add to their allowlist. I didn't see any reference to outbound IPs anywhere in the portal or documentation (though I may have missed it).
Does Kentico maintain a list of possible outbound IP addresses for sites deployed to the SaaS environment? Or would it be the same as Azure's?
***
**Environment**
* Xperience by Kentico version: 30.2.2 * .NET version: 8 * Execution environment: SaaS
